subject: Learning
title: Chunking: Less Is More
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Chunking: Less Is More.

hook.text: The number 1776149218650101 looks impossible to memorize. But 1776-1492-1865-0101 is easy.

buildup.text: Chunking groups individual items into meaningful clusters, reducing the load on working memory.

discovery.text: Your working memory holds about 7 items. Chunking lets each slot carry more information.

twist.text: Experts chunk automatically. A chess master sees patterns, not 32 individual pieces.
